channel.title: Comments on: Swedish Meatballs – Cooking Class 5

item.title: By: Melinda
item.dc:creator: Melinda
item.description: This is the same recipe I use, only I thicken the sauce with cornflour just before serving. It's a favourite here!
item.content:encoded: This is the same recipe I use, only I thicken the sauce with cornflour just before serving. It’s a favourite here!

item.title: By: Anita
item.dc:creator: Anita
item.description:
Hi Leela - I must try these IKEA meatballs, they sound lovely. Thanks! :)
Hi Hobosic - I try and update every couple of days, just depends on how busy I am. Thanks for visiting! :P
item.content:encoded:
Hi Leela – I must try these IKEA meatballs, they sound lovely. Thanks! 🙂

Hi Hobosic – I try and update every couple of days, just depends on how busy I am. Thanks for visiting! 😛

item.title: By: Hobosic
item.dc:creator: Hobosic
item.description: Hi, Amazing! Not clear for me, how offen you updating your leaveroomfordessert.com.
item.content:encoded: Hi, Amazing! Not clear for me, how offen you updating your leaveroomfordessert.com.

item.title: By: Leela@SheSimmers
item.dc:creator: Leela@SheSimmers
item.description: Was going to mention IKEA but noticed others already did. :) These meatballs look much better than the ones at IKEA, though.
item.content:encoded: Was going to mention IKEA but noticed others already did. 🙂 These meatballs look much better than the ones at IKEA, though.

item.title: By: Anita
item.dc:creator: Anita
item.description:
Thanks for the comments!
Hi Steph - I've just heard great reviews about the meatballs at IKEA, I must try them. The only time I went to IKEA I spent all my time shopping and no time eating!! :(
Hi Lorraine - I love the sauce too! I can't believe how good it was :) Home-made should surely be better, although I haven't tried IKEA ones... yet :P
Hi Arwen - I was surprised at the timing too! We made these last week and I finally got a chance to post them and heard everyone talking about the ones at IKEA. Maybe anyone who can't get in there can try make their own :)
Hi Alexandra - Lucky you! I only just tried these, would have loved someone to make these for me earlier :)
Hi FFichiban - :) I thought you just had meatballs at IKEA? :P Hehehe Thanks!
Hi Julia - Hehe, I won't tell your partner :P Thanks
item.content:encoded:
Thanks for the comments!

Hi Steph – I’ve just heard great reviews about the meatballs at IKEA, I must try them. The only time I went to IKEA I spent all my time shopping and no time eating!! 🙁

Hi Lorraine – I love the sauce too! I can’t believe how good it was 🙂 Home-made should surely be better, although I haven’t tried IKEA ones… yet 😛

Hi Arwen – I was surprised at the timing too! We made these last week and I finally got a chance to post them and heard everyone talking about the ones at IKEA. Maybe anyone who can’t get in there can try make their own 🙂

Hi Alexandra – Lucky you! I only just tried these, would have loved someone to make these for me earlier 🙂

Hi FFichiban – 🙂 I thought you just had meatballs at IKEA? 😛 Hehehe Thanks!

Hi Julia – Hehe, I won’t tell your partner 😛 Thanks

item.title: By: Julia @ Mélanger
item.dc:creator: Julia @ Mélanger
item.description: YUM! I love Swedish meatballs. But don't tell my partner (half-Finnish!). These look great.
item.content:encoded: YUM! I love Swedish meatballs. But don’t tell my partner (half-Finnish!). These look great.

item.title: By: FFichiban
item.dc:creator: FFichiban
item.description: Wahhhhhh I want meatballsss XD! and home cooked ones would be awesome XD!
item.content:encoded: Wahhhhhh I want meatballsss XD! and home cooked ones would be awesome XD!

item.title: By: Alexandra@Chefspiration
item.dc:creator: Alexandra@Chefspiration
item.description: oh yumm...these look good! I had a swedish friend growing up and everytime we went to her home we had swedish meatballs...lovely!
item.content:encoded: oh yumm…these look good! I had a swedish friend growing up and everytime we went to her home we had swedish meatballs…lovely!

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: You've timed this recipe perfectly after the Ikea crowd talking about their Swedish meatballs. I like your idea of putting caramelised onions in the mashed sweet potato!
item.content:encoded: You’ve timed this recipe perfectly after the Ikea crowd talking about their Swedish meatballs. I like your idea of putting caramelised onions in the mashed sweet potato!

item.title: By: Lorraine @ Not Quite Nigella
item.dc:creator: Lorraine @ Not Quite Nigella
item.description: Yum! I adore Swedish meatballs-especially the sauce. I always come away from a trip to Ikea with a bag although admittedly I think homemade ones are going to be better ;)
item.content:encoded: Yum! I adore Swedish meatballs-especially the sauce. I always come away from a trip to Ikea with a bag although admittedly I think homemade ones are going to be better 😉
